Workflow.Name: Provision Environment Pipeline ID is mandatory when merge strategy is parallel
Workflow.Description: A parallel merge strategy requires an environment to be provisioned for each pull request. The pipeline identified by the provided ID will be ran to provision an environment for this solution.

LocalizedName.description: Provision Environment Pipeline ID is mandatory when merge strategy is parallel

Description.description: A parallel merge strategy requires an environment to be provisioned for each pull request. The pipeline identified by the provided ID will be ran to provision an environment for this solution.
